data.title: Homes for Sale: 4719 Homestead Trail, Woodburn, IN 46797
data.meta_description: Just listed! Check out this two story home on a finished basement in Woodburn schools. data.text:
Just listed! Check out this two story home on a finished basement in Woodburn schools. Situated on a cul-de-sac lot in Homestead Place, this home boasts over 3,100 finished sq ft. Home features a spacious main floor master bedroom with an en suite and walk in closet. Kitchen has been recently upgraded and includes granite countertops, new hardware, newer stainless steel kitchen appliances. The kitchen features a pantry, island with additional storage, a large eat in kitchen area, backsplash, under cabinet lighting and motion sensor light features on kitchen and dining space lights. The great room features a cozy brick fireplace and cathedral ceilings. Also situated on the main floor is a half bath. Heading upstairs, there is a loft space with plenty of space for an office or play area for the kids. The full bathroom has been updated with newer flooring, vanity, toilet and an adorable tile surround. Upstairs also features two spacious bedrooms perfect for guests or the kids. All of the bedrooms are receiving new flooring on 7/19. Heading to the basement, you will find a large area perfect for entertaining, crafting, homeschooling or whatever hobby you have in mind. Heading outside, a new vinyl fence was installed within the last few years. The roof received a complete tear off with 30 yr dimensional shingles in fall 2020 plus fresh landscaping! Plus, a deck area for your BBQs. All kitchen appliances, including the washer and dryer to remain with the home.

At North Eastern Group Realty, we are prepared to assist our clients with their significant Fort Wayne real estate decisions. Our corporate commitment is to provide real knowledge, proven experience and professional, quality service. To search all Fort Wayne homes for sale or find a Fort Wayne REALTOR®, visit our website at NorthEasternGroup.com.

North Eastern Group Realty is Fort Wayne’s largest independent real estate company located at 10808 La Cabreah Lane, Fort Wayne, IN 46845.
